text: The following is a list of deaths that should be noted in February 2019. Names under each date are noted in the order of the alphabet by last name or pseudonym. Deaths of non-humans are noted here also if it is worth noting. ==February== ===1=== * Conway Berners-Lee, 97, English mathematician and computer scientist, developed Ferranti Mark 1. * Alice Dye, 91, American amateur golfer and golf course designer (TPC at Sawgrass).Alice Dye, 'the first lady of golf architecture,' has died * Jeremy Hardy, 57, English comedian, radio host and panelist (The News Quiz, I'm Sorry I Haven't a Clue, Jeremy Hardy Speaks to the Nation), cancer.Jeremy Hardy: Comedian and Radio 4 panel star dies aged 57 * Ursula Karusseit, 79, German actress (Ways across the Country, KLK Calling PTZ – The Red Orchestra), heart disease.Schauspielerin Ursula Karusseit ist mit 79 Jahren gestorben * Lisa Seagram, 82, American actress (A House Is Not a Home, Caprice, The Beverly Hillbillies), dementia.Lisa Seagram, Actress on 'Batman' and 'The Beverly Hillbillies,' Dies at 82 * Clive Swift, 82, English actor (The National Health, Keeping Up Appearances, The Old Guys) and songwriter, respiratory failure.Clive Swift obituary ===2=== * Walter James Edyvean, 80, American Roman Catholic prelate, Auxiliary Bishop of Boston (2001–2014).Bishop Walter James Edyvean † * Carol Marsh Jr., Ex-Army Chief and Presidents’ Adviser, Dies at 92 * Bruno Messerli, 87, Swiss geographer.Trauerfall Messerli-Ruedin Bruno * Matti Nykänen, 55, Finnish ski jumper, Olympic champion (1984, 1988), complications from diabetes.Matti Nykänen on kuollut * Leonie Ossowski, 93, German children's novelist and screenwriter (Zwei Mütter).Leonie Ossowski ist tot * Véronique Schiltz, 76, French historian.Véronique Schiltz Obituary * Izzy Young, 90, American-Swedish folklorist and columnist (Sing Out!).Izzy Young, Who Presided Over the Folk Revival, Dies at 90 ===5=== * Joe Presko, 90, American baseball player (St. Louis Cardinals, Detroit Tigers).Joseph E. Presko Sr. * Václav Vorlíček, 88, Czech movie director (Who Wants to Kill Jessie?, The End of Agent W4C, The Girl on the Broomstick), lung cancer.Zemřel Václav Vorlíček, režisér Tří oříšků pro Popelku title: Deaths in February 2019
